Peter Okoye (amụrụ na 18 Nọvemba 1981), onye a maara nke ọma dị ka Mr P, bụ onye Naịjirịa na-agụ egwu. Ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama n'afọ 2000 dị ka onye otu P-Square duo ya na ejima ya nwoke Rudeboy ma n'afọ 2021 e nyere ya akara ugo mmụta Doctorate na Mahadum ESCAE dị na Benin Republic.
Maazị P na ejima ya Rudeboy tolitere n'otu nnukwu ezinụlọ, na Jos na Plauteau Steeti, Naịjirịa
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ Josephine Okoye na Mazi Moses Okoye
Peter na nwanne ya nwoke Paul sonyeere ụlọ akwụkwọ egwu na ihe nkiri, ebe ha malitere ịgba egwu, ịbụ abụ ma na-eme egwu nke onye na-ese ihe a ma ama dị ka MC Hammer, Bobby Brown na Michael Jackson.
N'afọ 2017, a gbahapụrụ P-Square ma ndị otu egwu abụọ ahụ kewara. Mr P bu ụzọ wepụta egwu ya akpọrọ "For My Head", "Cool It Down" n'afọ 2017.
N'afọ 2018, Maazị P na Nyanda nke Brick & Lace rụkọrọ ọrụ n'otu egwu akpọrọ "Wokie Wokie"

[isi iyi  dị  N'afọ 2021, Maazị P hiwere akara ndekọ nke ya nke a na-akpọ PClassic Label, akara ahụ bịanyere aka na onye na-eme ihe ike na onye na-egwu egwu DJ Switch na 2021, o wepụtara abọm izizi iri na isii akpọrọ, The Prodigal nke gosipụtara Tiwa Savage, Simi, Teni, Wande Coal, Tamar Braxton, Singah, Mohombi, DJ Switch, na OvieKelz.

N'afọ 2013, Peter Okoye na enyi ya nwanyị n'oge ahụ, Lola Omotayo nabatara nwa ha nwanyị Aliona n'ụlọ ọgwụ San Francisco na United States.   N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2013, ha abụọ lụrụ di na nwunye na Ark dị na Lekki, Lagos, Nigeria.

Na June 16, 2016, e mere Maazị P onye nnọchi anya ụgbọala Kia. E mekwara Maazị P onye nnọchi anya maka mmiri ara ehi Olympic, nke Nutricima limited mepụtara. Peter hiwere ihe ngosi TV nke akpọrọ Dance with Peter nke Globacom Telecommunication Limited kwadoro. N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2021, ekpughere ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya Adidas, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe nke na-ahụ maka akpụkpọ ụkwụ, uwe na ngwa.
